item.title: ZipZone
item.description: Zipzone Description: I was tired of trying to find a good file server for zip files, so I made my own! It’s still a work in progress, but I think it’s pretty good so far. Link: https://zipzone-web.challs.csc.tf/ Introduction ZipZone is the only one web in the beginner’s category and, as the title suggests, you have to upload zip files that will be unzipped later, so you have to download the extracted files afterwards.
